General.Name: NBTM New Materials Group Co Ltd
General.Description: NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd. produces and sells powder metallurgy mechanical parts worldwide. The company provides soft magnetic composite materials and metal injection molding products. It serves automobile, consumer electronic, soft magnetic, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Tongmuo new materials Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd. in March 2007. NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China.

6.Name: Mr. Fengmu  Yan
6.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
